title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 5 graded lots of crypto comics up for auctionLot 2 to 5 will come with COA as seenLOT 1: Crypterns #1 gold foil CBCS 9.8LOT 2: One Blue Land: Captain Bitcoin set #18/2000 CBCS 9.8-Captain Bitcoin Manga Edition "The Satoshi Series"-Captain Bitcoin "The Satoshi Series"LOT 3: One Blue Land: Captain Bitcoin set #19/2000 CBCS 9.6-Captain Bitcoin Manga Edition "The Satoshi Series"-Captain Bitcoin "The Satoshi Series"LOT 4: One Blue Land: Moon Rising #10/100 CBCS 8.5"The Satoshi Series" 1st edtionLOT 5: One Blue Land: Moon Rising #10/100 CBCS 8.0"The Satoshi Series" 1st edtionLOT 1LOT 2 frontLOT 3 frontLOT 2 & 3 backLOT 4 & LOT 5 frontLOT 4 & 5 backLOT 2-5 COAsSTARTING BID PER LOT 1,2,3: 0.0025BTCSTARTING BID PER LOT 4, 5: 0.0020BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JANUARY 17th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
